mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(dept_num, 2, '0')||LPAD(empl_num, 4, '0') AS empl_num, empl_password, authority FROM employee WHERE empl_num=#{ emplNum } AND dept_num=#{ deptNum }

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO employee(empl_num, dept_num, empl_name, empl_email, empl_password, authority) VALUE (#{ emplNum }, #{ deptNum }, #{ emplName }, #{ email }, #{ password }, #{ authVO.auth } )

mapper.update: UPDATE employee m SET empl_password = #{ password } WHERE empl_num = (SELECT empl_num FROM employee AS e WHERE e.empl_email = #{ email })
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.empl_num AS emplNum , e.empl_name AS emplName , e.empl_email AS email FROM employee e ORDER BY e.empl_num ASC
